parameters.text: "Anim: " & Player_Sprite.AnimationName & newline & "Frame: " & Player_Sprite.AnimationFrame & newline & "X: " & round((Player_Arms.X - Player_Sprite.ImagePointX("topleft"))) & newline & "Y: " & round((Player_Arms.Y - Player_Sprite.ImagePointY("topleft")))
